LanguageData.USInsectFoamPopper.label: 杀虫泡沫仓
LanguageData.USInsectFoamPopper.description: 当它内部的探测器检测到虫巢时，它会在一定半径内喷出杀虫泡沫. 也能手动触发.
LanguageData.USInsectFoamPopper_Blueprint.label: 杀虫泡沫仓(蓝图)
LanguageData.USInsectFoamPopper_Frame.label: 杀虫泡沫仓(建造中)
LanguageData.USInsectFoamPopper_Frame.description: 当它内部的探测器检测到虫巢时，它会在一定半径内喷出杀虫泡沫. 也能手动触发.
